defrost.translation[0].definitions[0].de: if frozen food defrosts, or if you defrost it, it gets warmer until it is not frozen
defrost.translation[0].definitions[1].de: if a freezer or refrigerator defrosts, or if you defrost it, it is turned off so that the ice inside it melts
defrost.translation[0].definitions[2].de: to remove ice from inside the windows of a car by using heat or warm air
